title: Happy Face Killer Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Hulu
text: If you love watching true crime films on serial killers, [Happy Face Killer](https://www.comingsoon.net/tag/happy-face-killer) is perfect for you, and we’ve all the streaming details for you. Directed by Rick Bota, this movie follows how a serial killer terrorizes the nation as he claims the lives of at least eight women and the massive manhunt the authorities organize leading to his arrest. The evasive perpetrator is infamous for sending chilling letters adorned with a distinctive happy face, marking his sinister signature. Here’s how you can watch and stream Happy Face Killer via streaming services such as Hulu. Is Happy Face Killer available to watch via streaming? Yes, Happy Face Killer is available to watch via streaming on Hulu. Written by Richard Christian Matheson, this true crime film follows Keith Jesperson, a truck driver covering long distances, killing at least eight women in a span of two years. According to the movie, this gruesome series of murders is the aftermath of his marital breakdown and a career setback that thwarted his ambition to join the Royal Canadian Mounted Police. Dubbed the “Happy Face Killer” due to the signature smiley face on his notes, Jesperson continues his murderous rampage amidst false confessions from a couple. However, the FBI, led by Agent Melinda Gand, and the Ruskin County Sheriff intensify their efforts to track him down. The film stars David Arquette as Keith Jesperson, Gloria Reuben as FBI agent Melinda Gand, and Daryl Shuttleworth as the Ruskin County Sheriff. The rest of the supporting cast include Stefanie von Pfetten, Josh Blacker, Melissa Montgomery, Emily Haine, Jordana Largy, Mittita Barber, and Kelly-Ruth Mercier.
